cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.introText: This Cookie Policy explains how Staysia uses cookies and similar tracking technologies on our website and services. By using our platform, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.
cookiePolicy.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the website remember information about your visit, making it easier to use and more personalized.
cookiePolicy.howWeUseCookiesText: We use cookies for the following purposes:
cookiePolicy.essentialText: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.
cookiePolicy.performanceText: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
cookiePolicy.functionalText: Enable personalized features and remember your preferences.
cookiePolicy.advertisingText: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign performance.
cookiePolicy.sessionCookiesText: Temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser.
cookiePolicy.persistentCookiesText: Remain on your device for a set period or until deleted.
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyCookiesText: Set by external services we use (e.g., analytics providers).
cookiePolicy.managingCookiesText: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.
cookiePolicy.browserSettingsText: Most browsers allow you to view, manage, and delete cookies. Instructions vary by browser‚Äîplease check your browser's help menu.
cookiePolicy.optOutText: You can opt out of third-party advertising cookies through industry opt-out pages.
cookiePolicy.contactUsText: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introText: At Staysia, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our property rental platform.
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectText: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
personalInfoItems: Name, email address, and phone number
usageItems: Communicate with you about your account
Improve our services and user experience
privacyPolicy.dataSharingText: We may share your information with:
sharingItems: Property hosts and guests (as necessary for bookings)
Service providers who assist our operations
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityText: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
rightsItems: Access and review your personal data
Export your data in a portable format
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. You can request deletion of your account at any time.
privacyPolicy.childrensPrivacyText: Our services are not intended for users under 18. We do not knowingly collect information from children.
privacyPolicy.internationalTransfersText: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.
privacyPolicy.changesToPolicyText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through our platform.
privacyPolicy.contactUsText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

termsOfService.introText: Welcome to Staysia. By accessing or using our property rental platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.
termsOfService.acceptanceText: By creating an account or using our services, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
termsOfService.eligibilityText: You must be at least 18 years old to use Staysia. By using our platform, you represent that you meet this age requirement.

about.title: About Staysia
about.subtitle: Connecting travelers with exceptional stays across Indonesia
about.missionText1: At Staysia, we believe that every journey deserves a perfect place to stay. We're dedicated to helping travelers discover unique accommodations that feel like home, while empowering hosts to share their properties with confidence.
about.missionText2: From bustling city apartments to serene beachfront villas, we curate exceptional stays that create lasting memories across Indonesia's diverse landscapes.
about.ceoDescription: Leading Staysia's vision to revolutionize property rentals across Indonesia with a focus on trust, quality, and exceptional guest experiences.

helpCenter.title: How can we help you?
helpCenter.subtitle: Find answers to your questions and get support
helpCenter.gettingStartedDesc: Learn the basics of using Staysia
helpCenter.contactSupportDesc: Get help from our support team
helpCenter.createAccountQ: How do I create an account?
helpCenter.createAccountA: Click 'Sign up' in the navigation menu and fill in your details. You'll receive a verification email to activate your account.
helpCenter.bookPropertyQ: How do I book a property?
helpCenter.bookPropertyA: Browse properties, select your dates, and click 'Book Now'. You must have a verified email to complete bookings.
helpCenter.cancelModifyQ: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
helpCenter.cancelModifyA: Yes, go to 'My Bookings' to view and manage your reservations. Cancellation policies vary by property.
helpCenter.verifyEmailQ: Why do I need to verify my email?
helpCenter.verifyEmailA: Email verification ensures account security and enables all features including making bookings.
helpCenter.paymentMethodsQ: What payment methods do you accept?
helpCenter.paymentMethodsA: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and digital payment methods. All payments are securely processed.
helpCenter.whenChargedA: Payment is processed when you confirm your booking. Some properties may require a deposit upfront.
helpCenter.hiddenFeesA: No. All fees including service charges and taxes are clearly displayed before you confirm your booking.
helpCenter.listPropertyQ: How do I list my property?
helpCenter.listPropertyA: Click 'Become a Host' and follow the registration process. You'll need to provide property details and verification documents.
helpCenter.hostingFeesA: We charge a small service fee on each booking. Details are provided during the host registration process.
helpCenter.receivePaymentsA: Payments are transferred to your registered bank account after guests check in, according to your payout schedule.
helpCenter.personalInfoA: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data.
helpCenter.propertiesVerifiedA: All properties undergo verification including photo verification and compliance checks before listing.
helpCenter.issueBookingQ: What if there's an issue with my booking?
helpCenter.issueBookingA: Contact our 24/7 support team immediately. We're here to help resolve any issues.
helpCenter.supportAvailable: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you

safetyInfo.title: Safety Information
safetyInfo.subtitle: Your safety and security are our top priorities. Learn about our booking policies and procedures.
safetyInfo.roomReservationDesc: Users can create new bookings based on the selected property and the available room dates and duration.
safetyInfo.cannotProcess: Newly created bookings cannot be processed by the tenant until the payment proof is uploaded.
safetyInfo.autoProcessed: Bookings will be processed automatically if payment is made through the integrated payment gateway.
safetyInfo.manualTransfer: For manual bank transfer payments, users must upload a valid payment proof to proceed.
safetyInfo.autoCancel: If users fail to upload the proof within that timeframe, the booking will automatically be cancelled.
safetyInfo.onlyJpgPng: Only .jpg or .png file extensions are allowed
safetyInfo.orderListDesc: Users can view a list of ongoing and completed orders (depending on their booking status).
safetyInfo.searchOrders: Users can search their orders by date and order number.
safetyInfo.supportDesc: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or concerns about your booking.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Options
cancellation.subtitle: Understand the cancellation policies for both guests and property hosts.
cancellation.cancelBeforeUpload: Users can only cancel their booking before uploading the payment proof.
cancellation.autoCancel: Automatic cancellation will also occur if the user fails to complete the payment within the given time limit.
cancellation.afterUpload: Once payment proof is uploaded and verified, cancellations must be processed through our support team. Refund policies will apply based on the property's cancellation terms.
cancellation.cancelNoProof: Tenants can cancel a booking only when the payment proof has not yet been uploaded.
cancellation.confirmationPopup: Before proceeding with the cancellation, a confirmation pop-up should appear asking the tenant to confirm the action.
cancellation.step2: Click the cancel button on the booking
cancellation.step3: Confirm the cancellation in the pop-up dialog
cancellation.step4: The guest will be notified automatically
cancellation.beforePaymentDesc: Free cancellation available for both guests and hosts with no penalties.
cancellation.afterPaymentDesc: Cancellations must be processed through support. Property-specific policies apply.
cancellation.afterCheckinDesc: No refunds available once the guest has checked in to the property.
cancellation.questionsDesc: Our support team can help you navigate cancellation policies and process your request.

hostResources.title: Host Resources
hostResources.subtitle: Everything you need to successfully manage your property and provide excellent service to your guests
hostResources.introDesc: As a property host on Staysia, you have access to powerful tools to manage your bookings, confirm payments, and communicate with your guests. Our comprehensive transaction management system ensures smooth operations and happy customers.
hostResources.transactionDesc: Tenants can approve or reject payment proofs uploaded by users.
hostResources.ownedProperties: Transactions that can be confirmed are only those belonging to properties owned by the tenant.
hostResources.autoEmail: When a tenant approves a transaction, the system will automatically send the room and transaction details to the renter's email.
hostResources.orderListDesc: Tenants can view a list of orders, categorized based on their booking status. This comprehensive view allows you to track all reservations, manage pending confirmations, and monitor completed stays in one centralized dashboard.
hostResources.confirmPaymentDesc: Tenants can manually confirm the user's payment proof.
hostResources.returnToWaiting: The order status will return to "Waiting for Payment."
hostResources.statusProcessing: The order status will change to "Processing."
hostResources.notifyUser: The system will send a notification to the user when their payment is approved.
hostResources.orderReminderDesc: Tenants can automatically send an email once a user's payment has been confirmed.
hostResources.propertyGuidelines: Guidelines and rules for using the property
hostResources.autoReminderDesc: One day before the check-in date, the system will automatically send a reminder email to the user to prepare for check-in.
hostResources.readyToHostDesc: Join thousands of successful hosts on Staysia. List your property today and start earning with our comprehensive management tools.

communityForum.forumDesc: Our community forum is currently under development. Soon, you'll be able to connect with thousands of hosts worldwide, share insights, get advice, and celebrate your hosting successes together. Stay tuned for updates!
communityForum.generalDiscussionDesc: Chat with fellow hosts about anything and everything

communityForum.tipsTricksDesc: Discover best practices and insider secrets for successful hosting
communityForum.successStoriesDesc: Celebrate achievements and inspire others with your hosting journey
communityForum.learnFromHostsDesc: Get insights and advice from successful hosts who have been there
communityForum.stayUpdatedDesc: Be the first to know about new features, updates, and best practices
communityForum.networkCollaborateDesc: Build relationships with other hosts and explore collaboration opportunities
communityForum.support247Desc: Get help anytime from our active community of hosts
communityForum.getNotifiedDesc: Be among the first to join our community forum when it launches. Sign up to receive updates and exclusive early access.

responsibleHosting.title: Responsible Hosting
responsibleHosting.subtitle: Building a sustainable and respectful hosting community for everyone
responsibleHosting.commitmentDesc1: At Staysia, we believe that great hosting goes beyond providing a place to stay. It's about creating safe, welcoming spaces while being mindful of our impact on guests, communities, and the environment. As a host on our platform, you play a crucial role in shaping positive experiences and building a sustainable future for hospitality.
responsibleHosting.commitmentDesc2: This guide outlines our principles for responsible hosting and provides practical steps you can take to be an exemplary host while contributing to the well-being of your guests, neighbors, and our planet.
responsibleHosting.fourPillars: The Four Pillars of Responsible Hosting
responsibleHosting.safetyFirstDesc: Ensure your property meets all safety standards and local regulations. Provide clear safety information to guests.
responsibleHosting.installDetectors: Install smoke detectors and fire extinguishers
responsibleHosting.guestWellbeingDesc: Create a welcoming and comfortable environment that respects guest privacy and comfort.
responsibleHosting.respectPrivacy: Respect guest privacy and quiet hours
responsibleHosting.envSustainabilityDesc: Implement eco-friendly practices to minimize your property's environmental impact.
responsibleHosting.communityRespectDesc: Be a good neighbor and contribute positively to the local community.
responsibleHosting.clearCommDesc: Set clear expectations with guests about house rules, check-in procedures, and local guidelines. Provide comprehensive property information before arrival.
responsibleHosting.propertyMaintDesc: Regular maintenance ensures guest safety and satisfaction. Keep your property in excellent condition and address issues promptly.
responsibleHosting.legalComplianceDesc: Stay informed about local hosting laws, tax obligations, and licensing requirements. Ensure your hosting activities are fully compliant.
responsibleHosting.fairPricingDesc: Set fair and transparent pricing. Be upfront about all fees and avoid hidden charges. Offer good value for the experience you provide.
responsibleHosting.commitDesc: Join us in creating a hosting community built on trust, respect, and sustainability. Together, we can make a positive impact on travelers, communities, and our planet.
